snippet: Mr. Leone, who was the youngest state treasurer for New Jersey at 33, served as president of the Twentieth Century from 1989 to 2011 and worked for progressive policy changes.
abstract: Richard C Leone, prominent New Jersey politician and former Port Authority of New York and New Jersey chairman, dies at age 75.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Leone, who was the youngest state treasurer for New Jersey at 33, served as president of the Twentieth Century from 1989 to 2011 and worked for progressive policy changes.

headline.main: Richard Leone, 75, Dies; Port Authority Chairman and Force in N.J. Politics
headline.print_headline: Richard Leone, 75, Dies; Port Authority Chairman and Force in N.J. Politics
